name: Channel Auto forward bot
description: Telegram auto forwarding bot. Create your Fork now.

AS_COPY.description: set this to true to forward message as copy

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get this from @BotFather

CHANNEL_ID.description: your channel id in format -10023352648:-100655379 (from channel id:to channel id) if you want to give more channels seperate them with white space
